title: 游戏打不开崩溃了
author: RuiFen
txt_content:
游戏打不开崩溃了
下面是错误：

*** Launching Game ***
[09:14:41][launcher/ERROR] Cought exception!
Minecraft崩溃了！
可能是Mod或其他问题。
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
 at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
 at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.Launcher.main(SourceFile:124)
Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/lwjgl/LWJGLException
 at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:36)
 ... 5 more
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.lwjgl.LWJGLException
 at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
 ... 6 more
*** Game Exited ***

replies.txt_content: mod冲突吧？建议一个一个的排除试试

replies.author: Stagnate_小萌
replies.txt_content: java问题，看看路径设置对了么

replies.author: ZZ9788
replies.txt_content: 应该是mod冲突  吧刚下的mod都杀掉 再一个个的从新下来 打开

replies.author: 滇访
replies.txt_content: mod冲突,把mod都删了在一个个安上,看那个是问题根源。要是懒得一个个试就直接换个版本的MC好了,舍不得以前的存档可以备个份
